Asmodeus Tiefling Traits in Baldur's Gate 3

Infernal Legacy: Gain access to the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability: Level 1: Produce Flame. A flickering flame appears in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 9m radius and deals 1d8Fire damage when thrown. Level 3: Hellish Rebuke.
